response.overview: This film tells the story of the crash of the former Soviet Union "Soyuz One" spacecraft carrying Vladimir Komarov on April 24, 1967. The short film’s stance on this air crash tends to express the hardships of the aerospace industry and praise the greatness of the astronauts, while some artistic processing and adaptation of the protagonist’s more tragic actual situation.
response.tagline: This film tells the story of the crash of the former Soviet Union "Soyuz One" spacecraft carrying Vladimir Komarov on April 24, 1967.
response.title: Ad Astra
